_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: PocketmineMP
author: info@swisscrafting.ch
description:
Pocketmine Egg
by onekintaro from swisscrafting.ch
with the nice help from #eggs Channel on Pterodactyl-Discord :)

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates

mkdir -p /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server
curl -sSL -o PocketMine-MP.phar https://jenkins.pmmp.io/job/PocketMine-MP/lastStableBuild/artifact/PocketMine-MP.phar
curl -sSL -o start.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pmmp/PocketMine-MP/master/start.sh
curl -sSL -o php.binary.tar.gz https://jenkins.pmmp.io/job/PHP-7.2-Aggregate/6/artifact/PHP-7.2-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz
tar -xzvf php.binary.tar.gz
rm -rf /mnt/server/php.binary.tar.gz
chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh

touch /mnt/server/banned-ips.txt
touch /mnt/server/banned-players.txt
touch /mnt/server/ops.txt
mkdir -p /mnt/server/players
touch /mnt/server/white-list.txt
mkdir -p /mnt/server/worlds
mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins
mkdir -p /mnt/server/resource_packs
touch /mnt/server/server.log

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
